subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

WAS ROSIE O'DONNELL PUSHED OUT OF "THE VIEW"?
Rosie O'Donnell says she's leaving "The View" because she
and ABC couldn't reach an agreement during contract
negotiations. But is there more to the story? Was Rosie pushed
out because of a litany of controversies since she joined the
show? Showbiz Tonight asks all the provocative questions!

MISS AMERICA'S SEX STING!
How Miss America worked with
the TV show "America's Most Wanted" to catch men suspected of
being child sex predators! John Walsh, one-on-one, with the
amazing story on TV's most provocative entertainment news show.

REGIS IS BACK!
It's Regis Philbin's first day back
on "Live with Regis & Kelly" after his heart surgery, and
Showbiz Tonight is right there on the set!

SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY: 
Rosie leaving "The View": Was
she pushed out?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL! 
Send your response to the
Question Of The Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us
what you think. Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To
send your video email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your
video responses on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN
Headline Prime.
